writer.name: 亚历山德拉·佩洛西 Alexandra Pelosi

director.name: 亚历山德拉·佩洛西 Alexandra Pelosi

this_title: Outside the Bubble: On the Road with Alexandra Pelosi
trans_title: 与佩洛西一起看看真实的美国
introduction: Intent on escaping her coastal bubble, Alexandra Pelosi sets out on a cross-country trip to engage in conversations with fellow Americans in an effort to gain an unfiltered understanding of other perspectives.
chinese_title: 与佩洛西一起看看真实的美国
foreign_title: Outside the Bubble: On the Road with Alexandra Pelosi
